kadawatha, mankada para pradeshayedi thiyunu aayudhayakin paharadi pudgalayeku ghathanaya kara thibe.ghathanayata lakwa aththe imbaulgoda, parakandeniya pradeshaye padinchiwa siti 39 hawiridi pudgalayeku bawa polisiya pawasuweya.ghathanaya sidu kala sakakaruda thuwala laba athi athara ohu polisiya wisin athadanguwata gena thibe.sakakaru polis aarakshawa yatathe me wana wita ragama rohale prathikara labana bawa polisiya sandahan kaleya.siddhiya sambandhayen kadawatha polisiya wadidura wimarshana sidu karayi.

shrilanipaya mara damanna ida denne naha | dinamina niwasa shrilanipaya mara damanna ida denne naha shrilanipaya mara damanna ida denne naha bandaranayakawarun jiwitha parithyagayen aarambha kala me rate janathawage pramukhathama pakshayak wana shri lanka nidahas pakshaya mara damimata rajapakshawarun awastha kipayakadi katayuthu kala bawath eheth owuntath, kisiwakutath apa aadaraniya pakshaya mara damimata nohaki wana lesa diwihimiyen pakshaya aaraksha kara ganimata kapawana bawath shri lanka nidahas pakshaye jyeshta anushasika saha hitapu janadhipathini chandrika bandaranayaka kumarathunga mahathmiya prakasha kalaya.
